summary: LaTeX support (MikTeX) for GVIM on Win32-systems
name: latex-mik.vim
description:
This script adds a menu for LaTeX-related functions for .tex, .bib-files

To process multiple file LaTeX-projects, enter the project name (e.g.
``myproject'') at the prompt, if ``myproject.tex'' is the main file.

Menu options address:

  (pdf)latex
  bibtex
  makeindex
  yap (dvi-viewer)
  dvips
  gsview32
  tth

Latex-mik supports entering commands and environments.
install_details: For installation, please put the script file (latex-mik.vim) into the vim plugin-directory

versions.release_notes: Bugfix (problem related to current working directory), more LaTeX environments  supported
Important functions mapped to key sequences
